text:
[Verse]
Under the sky we lay tonight
Stars above shining bright
Dreams take flight like paper planes
Wishes whispered in soft refrains

[Verse 2]
Moonlight dances on our skin
Breathing in the night again
Sparkles paint the midnight air
Magic moments everywhere

[Chorus]
Starry nights we feel alive
Dancing through the velvet skies
Hold my hand we'll drift away
Lost in dreams till break of day

[Verse 3]
Echoes of a distant song
Guiding us where we belong
Hearts in sync we float and sway
Nighttime keeps the world at bay

[Bridge]
Follow the stars they'll show us how
Beneath the silver glow we vow
To cherish each and every spark
That lights us up within the dark

[Chorus]
Starry nights we feel alive
Dancing through the velvet skies
Hold my hand we'll drift away
Lost in dreams till break of day
title: Starry Nights
